channel.title: Spec bar yellow text?
channel.description: On my server, why is the words ' s p e c i a l a t t a c k' only in yellow?

item.title: Spec bar yellow text?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Take a look at the methods nothing wrong.
